mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `match` (match_date, match_info, match_time, club_num, field_num, match_photo) VALUES (#{matchDate}, #{matchInfo}, #{matchTime}, #{clubNum}, #{fieldNum}, #{matchPhoto})
mapper.select: SELECT `match`.match_num, `match`.match_date, `match`.match_time, `match`.club_num, `match`.field_num, field.field_name FROM `match` JOIN field ON `match`.field_num = field.field_num WHERE `match`.club_num = #{clubNum}

SELECT `match`.match_num, `match`.match_date, `match`.match_time, `match`.match_info, `match`.match_photo, `match`.field_num, field.field_name, field.field_x, field.field_y, field.field_newaddress, field.field_oldaddress FROM `match` JOIN field ON `match`.field_num = field.field_num WHERE `match`.match_num = #{MatchNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO matchboard (mb_name, mb_file, club_num, mb_type) VALUES (#{mbName}, #{mbFile}, #{clubNum}, #{mbType})
